Service Details: - Offers a program specifically designed to meet the unique needs of pre-teen and adolescent girls- Fosters safe and healthy emotional development of young girls by strengthening their sense of connection, belonging and resiliency- Provides opportunities for girls to live safer, healthier lives and fulfill their rights to freedom from violence, exploitation and abuse
Cost: - Initial intake appointment is free- Most services are fully funded by donations or government grants, therefore, there is no charge for services- Counseling for adult survivors of sexual abuse is on a sliding scale fee-for-service- There is also a fee associated with pardon applications
